---
title: Getting started

description: Information on how to getting started by working on the project database
---

To work on the Steno Project database at Statistics Denmark, you can either create your own project under the project database, or if your purpose fits under one of the already existing subprojects in the project database, you can request permission to access the relevant project. On this page you will find information about existing projects in the project database and  preliminary procedure if you want to set up your own project.
